import React from 'react' import {WithResources} from '../../../../Resource Manager/HOC/WithResources' class GameOverMenu extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props) this.state = { gameOverStyleImg: { height: '100vh', width: '100vw', maxWidth: "35%", maxHeight: "35%", backgroundImage: 'url('+(props.resourceManager.getImage("GameOver.png")), position: 'absolute', top: "23%", left: "35%", zIndex: 5, backgroundRepeat: "no-repeat", overflow: "hidden", backgroundSize: "contain", }, scoreBoardStyleImg: { height: '100vh', width: '100vw', maxWidth: "35%", maxHeight: "35%", backgroundImage: 'url('+(props.resourceManager.getImage("SheepScoreBoard.png")), position: 'absolute', top: "40%", left: "35%", zIndex: 5, backgroundRepeat: "no-repeat", overflow: "hidden", backgroundSize: "contain", }, scoreStyle: { position: 'absolute', top: "28%", right: "15%", zIndex: 5, fontSize: 60, fontWeight: "bold", fontFamily: "Pixel" }, highScoreStyle: { position: 'absolute', top: "64%", right: "15%", zIndex: 5, fontSize: 60, fontWeight: "bold", fontFamily: "Pixel" }, } } render(){ return(
{this.props.score}
{this.props.highScore}
) } } export default WithResources(GameOverMenu)
